text: [Music]
transferring active datasets online can
be complicated between writing scripts
for transfers expensive software tools
and time and network constraints it
often requires unnecessary heavy lifting
now AWS Data Sync makes transferring
data fast and easy whether you're
closing data centers or retiring storage
arrays pushing data from on-premises
systems for processing in AWS or you
have a massive amount of files to
protect you can use Data Sync to copy
active datasets rapidly into Amazon s3
Amazon EFS or Amazon fsx for Windows
file server connect Data Sync to your
existing storage systems with local
agents and the service simply rapidly
and securely migrates your data to the
cloud data sync scales to meet your
needs by taking care of the
infrastructure in the cloud to move data
at network speeds and it integrates
natively with AWS storage to optimally
manage transfers data syncs network
optimizations improve performance and
accelerate your transfers using a
purpose-built protocol and parallel
streams so you can move data up to ten
times faster than with open source tools
whether your data is in transit or at
rest it is encrypted and you can have an
automatic integrity check done to make
sure it arrives intact data sync is cost
effective since you pay only for the
data copied and avoid the burden of
managing infrastructure or buying
expensive file transfer software get
started with AWS data sync today for
your data migrations
learn more at aws.amazon.com slash data
sync
